LanguageData.Cosmos.OrbitalPointerMenuDesc: Select the type of satellite to control and set up the attack mode.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.SpaceObjectDead: {0} lost a critical amount of strength and crashed to the surface of the planet.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.ObjectLaunched: The object was successfully launched into orbit.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.LoyalistSatellitesIsNull: There are no charged satellites capable of signaling. Perhaps they are inside the hangars.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.SatellitesIsNull: There are no charged satellites of the selected type to attack. Perhaps they are inside the hangars.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.MegalithSatellitesIsNull: There are no satellites to connect. Perhaps they are inside the hangars.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.FactionIsHostile: You cannot contact representatives of the hostile faction.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.BargainFailed: The price cannot be lower than the market price.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.Purchase: The purchase was successful. The goods will be delivered in transport capsules.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.MilitaryHelpFail: The ship's crew is not ready to provide you with military help. Not enough landing teams.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.MilitaryHelpSuccess: The landing team is sent in capsules.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.PercivalDropFail: Could not find available cargo beacons to drop cargo on «Percival» satellite. They were lost.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.PercivalDropSuccess: The «Percival» satellite has successfully dropped the recovered cargo onto one of your cargo beacons.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.ObjectDisconnected: Station «Hive» lost the connection with the object.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.SpaceObjectJoinFight: The selected object enters the battle.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.FightSpaceObjectsIsNull: You don't have the right satellites to fight.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.VictoryFight: You have defeated the {0} faction in the battle, they are now hostile to you.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.VictoryFighttNotGoodwill: You have defeated the {0} faction in the battle.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.VictoryFightNullFaction: You have defeated the neutral forces in the battle.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.DefeatFight: You were defeated in the battle with faction {0}, they are now hostile to you.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.DefeatFightNotGoodwill: You were defeated in the battle with faction {0}.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.DefeatFightNullFaction: You were defeated in the battle with the neutral forces.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.DropCapsules: Part of the cargo and crew could survive the battle and land in capsules.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.SpaceObjectsInFightIsNul: You have not set up a single object for battle.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.QuestCompleted: The quest has been completed successfully. The reward will arrive in capsules.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.QuestFailed: The quest failed. You gave the wrong answer.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.QuestAnswerIsNull: You have not entered an answer.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.MaxLevel: The maximum level has already been reached.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.PsySatelliteEmanation: The psy-satellite emitted a terrible hum.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Messages.SpaceObjectGetDamage: {0}, ID: {1} has been damaged by a solar flare.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Letters.StrategicLaunchDetectedDe: The launch of a high-power strategic missile, directed from orbit by the {0} fraction, was detected.
LanguageData.Cosmos.GUI.NovaxMenuNullObjects: There are no space objects in orbit
LanguageData.Cosmos.GUI.HiveMenuNullObjects: There are no objects connected with the station in orbit
LanguageData.Cosmos.GUI.ShopContainersIsNull: There are no items left on the ship from this category
LanguageData.Cosmos.GUI.RelationWillChange: The faction will become hostile at the start of the battle
LanguageData.Cosmos.GUI.CurrentModuleIsNull: This window will display the parameters of the selected module.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Quest.FanoCondition: No code is the beginning of another.
LanguageData.Cosmos.Settings.MinRichForEvents: Minimum wealth for the appearance of events
LanguageData.Cosmos.Settings.SolarFlareDamageChance: Chance of damage to objects by solar flare
LanguageData.Cosmos.Item.ContainerDesc: A durable container for delivering goods to the surface of the planet.
